Class OpticalPropertiesConverter

Namespace
Vts
Assembly
Vts.dll

Describes optical properties Converter for deserializing OPs based on (mua, mus, g, n) not on (mua, musp, g, n) ref: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23017716/json-net-how-to-deserialize-without-using-the-default-constructor/23017892#23017892
